activities: The Yesware platform enables sales people to be more successful by providing e-mail tracking and analytics, scheduling tools, presentation tracking and analytics and Saleforce & CRM syncing.   We collect Personal Data from users of our Services such as first and last name, phone number and e-mail address.   We use this data to establish accounts, provide functionality for the platform and to facilitate communication between Yesware and our customers.
